dict.acceptation: 创造，创作；产生；封爵，把…封为（贵族）；

sent.orig: Call Create to create a modeless dialog box using a dialog-box template from a resource.
sent.trans: 调用Create,使用资源中对话框模板来创建非模态对话框。

sent.orig: Use create statement to create database object.
sent.trans: 使用CREATE语句创建新的数据库对象。

sent.orig: Create fails if the file has been opened in compatibility mode access by any other process.
sent.trans: 如果文件被其它进程以incompatibility模式打开，这是create操作会失败。

sent.orig: You create your thoughts, your thoughts create your intentions, and your intentions create your reality.
sent.trans: 你创造思想，思想创造目的，目的创造现实。

sent.orig: Customers are source power for us to create fortune. Create bright future and create beautiful life.
sent.trans: 客户是我们创造财富的源动力：创造辉煌前景·创造美好生活。
